description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of its client, Correctional Service Canada (CSC) - CORCAN has a requirement to establish up to one (1) Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) per area of work for the installation of CORCAN Furniture and related support services, on an as and when requested basis.
full_summary:
# 21C20-230961 Furniture Installation Services in Ontario and Atlantic Regions
=====================================

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Reference Number**: WS3981562809
* **Date Published**: 2024-02-08
* **Closing Date and Time**: 2024-03-07T14:00:00 EST

### Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Correctional Service Canada (CSC), is seeking to establish Regional Individual Standing Offers (RIrvine Sheets). Back to normal. The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Correctional Service Canada (CSC), has a requirement to establish up to one (1) Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) per area of work for the installation of CORCAN Furniture and related support services, on an as and when requested basis.

### Key Information

* **Classification of Goods or Services**: Office furniture installation or reconfiguration service.
* **Regions of Delivery**: New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Ontario (except National Capital Region).
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: TBA
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 30 April 2025
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding.
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation may be subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada
